title: Kit, Sucking too Hard on That Lollipop
content:
[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]

++ Kit, Sucking too Hard on That Lollipop

[[/=]]

So it's only taken me nearly 6 years from my [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/and-then-kit-slept first Tale] to actually do a hand-drawing of [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/kit-s-home-hub-of-happening Kit], wherein he is smoking a [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/that-one-time-kit-tried-to-kill-himself lollipop] because 'things could become other things, if you want them enough.'

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/oh8ygK3.jpg]]
[[=]]

++++++ //"Sucking too Hard on that Lollipop", marker and ink, May 2023//

[[/=]]

Hopefully, more good art will happen again, and I will once more have an Artist Hub, but for now, please consider [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/reform-the-universe reforming the universe] with me, where you can find Kit and a mishmash of other horrors, comforts and devastations.

[[=]]

+++++ Do you want to meet [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:gerbilgoddess The Gerbil Goddess?]

+++++ Do you want to see a Goddess wear a [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:ontheinsidebitch human face?]

[[/=]]
author: Zara Calico
